item.title: October 2017 Auto Sales Predictions
item.description: Below are predictions for 10-2017 autosales for each auto brand. I modeled monthley car sales by nameplate (eg Camry, Civic, etc), predicted one step ahead forecast and summed by manufacture. The model is a state-space model with trend and seasonality of 12. Manufacturers 2017-10-01 Acura 13434 Alfa 4174 Audi 19463 Bentley 147 BMW 24671 Buick 16098 Cadillac 16087 Chevrolet 188386 Chrysler 11397 Dodge 31470 Fiat 1889 Ford 201647 Genesis 2911 GMC 49994 Honda 117972 Hyundai 48862 Infinit 2597 Infiniti 12237 Jaguar 3599 Jeep 65997 Kia 54669 Land 7680 Lexus 27738 Lincoln 8837 Maserati 1024 Mazda 22668 Mercedes 20358 Mercedes-Benz 10691 Mini 3702 Mitsubishi 8867 Nissan 104120 Porsche 4199 Ram 45534 Scion 0 Smart 170 Subaru 53947 Tesla 4553 Toyota 185563 Volvo 10906 VW 28004

item.title: Exploring Uncertainty with Bayesian ML
item.description: Introduction: Bayesian machine learning techniques allow us to obtain a posterior density for individual predictions instead of just the mean. This additional information allows us to understand and explore the uncertainty involved. However not all uncertainties are the same; one could be certain the mean of a predicted value is a certain value but there could be high variance or one can not be certain of a particular prediction because the training set didnâ€™t include values like the predicted input.

item.title: About
item.description: This is a “hello world” example website for the blogdown package. The theme was forked from @jrutheiser/hugo-lithium-theme and modified by Yihui Xie.
